sec.p: DNA was extracted from tissue samples using the DNeasy Tissue kit (QIAGEN). The cytochrome b (cyt- b), cytochrome c oxidase subunit I and II (COI and COII), NADH dehydrogenase subunit 2 and 6 (ND 2 and ND 6), ATP synthetase subunit 8 (ATP 8) and control region (CR) genes were amplified via the polymerase chain reaction (PCR) [ 39- 44]. The same primers were used for amplification and sequencing reactions. Methods of purification and sequencing were as described in Qu et al. [ 45]. All sequences are accessible at GenBank (Accession nos: HM601543- 602022).
